During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Eiffel Tower (0.6 mi), Musée d'Orsay (1.0 mi), and Champs-Elysees (1.1 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.

name: Hotel 34B - Astotel
description: You'll be amazed by the 100% French interiors at Hotel 34B. This 3-star hotel, ideal for a cultural holiday or shopping trip in Paris, is close to the Galeries Lafayette, Printemps Haussmann and Grand Boulevards. Culture fans will enjoy the hotel's closeness to the Folies Bergères, Opéra Garnier and Musée Grévin. Right next to a metro station on lines 8 and 9, you can travel all over Paris in a flash. A charming 3-star hotel in Paris' 9th arrondissement, with its delicate and detailed design, Hotel 34B stands out from the crowd. The interior decoration and French soul of the hotel ensure a purely Français experience! With its innovative and original design and 3-star service, you will be delighted by Hotel 34B. Stay in one of its 128 rooms, each decorated in an unusual style. Exceptional comfort with high quality, spacious 2-metre beds. Use the free WiFi to organise your days. Enjoy your breakfast with fresh and varied produce in the cosy lobby, then relax on the comfy sofas in the lounge. Travel guides and other books on France are at your disposal, to introduce you to the riches of the country and perhaps help you organise your trips. Soft drinks and snacks are available at the open bar in the afternoon. The attentive staff and warm atmosphere at Hotel 34B will make your stay in Paris truly memorable.

name: Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur
description:
See why so many travelers make Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur their hotel of choice when visiting Kuala Lumpur. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a trendy setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Close to some of Kuala Lumpur's most popular landmarks, such as Lake Symphony (0.8 mi) and KLCC - Bukit Bintang Pedestrian Walkway (1.0 mi), Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur is a great destination for tourists.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur offers guests free wifi.
Plus, Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur offers an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day.
Travelers looking to enjoy some crab can head to Fuego at Troika Sky Dining, Mosaic, or THIRTY8. Otherwise, you may want to check out a Spanish restaurant such as El Cerdo, Pinchos Tapas Bar, or The Rum Bar KL.
Kuala Lumpur is also known for some great art museums, including Islamic Arts Museum Malaysia, Galeri Petronas, and Art House Gallery Museum of Ethnic Arts, which are not too far from Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur.
At Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Kuala Lumpur.

name: Mai Inci Hotel
description: Mai İnci Hotel is located in the center of Antalya, at a point within walking distance of historical and touristic places and places to visit. The facility, which was opened in September 2021, was built with a brand new architectural style. The rooms have all kinds of equipment and materials that the guests need and are designed in a completely comfortable way. Our hotel consists of 27 rooms in total, and our rooms are classified in 4 different categories. Economy class is categorized as standard double, superior rooms and deluxe rooms. Our hotel is one of the most suitable hotels in Antalya in terms of price and performance for honeymoon couples, families, summer vacation, New Year's holiday, February 14 holiday, etc. After a wonderful breakfast at our hotel, you can take a tour to the "Karpuzkaldıran Waterfall", Turkey's only waterfall pouring into the sea, by boats departing from the marina right in front of the hotel. After the boat returns to the port, you can take a romantic walk in the narrow streets smelling of history on the historical Kaleiçi peninsula, just behind the port, and enjoy your dinner at one of the venues in Kaleiçi, listening to live music and enjoying the sweet coolness of the breeze on your cheeks.

name: Rixos Downtown Antalya
description: Set in exotic gardens in Ataturk Culture Park, this 5-star hotel near Konyaalti Beach overlooks sea and Taurus Mountains. It offers 4 dining outlets, a lagoon-style pool and a free shuttle to the beach. Konyaalti Beach is 400 metres away. For those who like to work out, the luxurious Rixos Downtown provides a modern gym and 2 tennis courts. There is also a spa where guests can unwind in the Turkish bath, or with a relaxing massage treatment. The Rixos Lounge features a panoramic terrace and serves upscale international cuisine in chic surroundings, while the Beach Bar & Restaurant is located on Konyaalti Beach and offers an a la carte menu. The hotel also features a range of bars serving exotic cocktails and light snacks. The bright guest rooms are decorated with rich fabrics and offer a private balcony with views of Antalya or the Mediterranean Sea. They also have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a seating area with a couch.

name: Primero Hotel
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Istanbul? Then look no further than Primero Hotel, a romantic hotel that brings the best of Istanbul to your doorstep.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Primero Hotel offer air conditioning and a minibar.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including room service. Guests of Primero Hotel are also welcome to enjoy free breakfast, located on site.
Nearby landmarks such as Suleymaniye Mosque (0.7 mi) and Istiklal Street (1.7 mi) make Primero Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Istanbul.
While visiting Istanbul, you may want to try some shrimp at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Olive Anatolian Restaurant, Old Ottoman Cafe & Restaurant, or Deraliye Ottoman Palace Cuisine Restaurant.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular historic sites such as Hagia Sophia Museum / Church (Ayasofya), Basilica Cistern, and Galata Tower.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Primero Hotel as you experience everything Istanbul has to offer.

name: The Story Hotel Pera
description: The building named after Kumbaracı Ramp, one of the most well-known streets of Beyoğlu consists of 24 rooms with a surface area of approximately 23-61 sq. meters and bar with a fireplace, restaurant and bistro.This building that attracts the attention of people walking by in Istiklal Street with its historical exteriors is located in Asmalı Mescit that became the center of not only our cultural heritage but also the entertainment with lively cafés and restaurants.Asmalı Mescit, the most well-known area of Beyoğlu and the most popular district of historical Pera resisting to being forgotten and defeated by time is the meeting point of entertainment lovers thanks to its night clubs and bars. Current historic fabric was restored with modern lines and it is surrounded by boutique hotels, restaurants and entertainment facilities. Thus Asmalımescit, the center of night life in Istanbul and the mirror of Beyoğlu not only entertains but also displays the finest details of cultural heritage. The building of The Story Hotel Pera dating back to early 1900s and matching with this location elegantly features the typical characteristics of French architecture that forms the architectural style of Beyoğlu predominantly. It was intended to create large suit rooms in this building which was decorated successfully to maximize the functionality. The Story Hotel Pera combines the modernism and history with its high ceilings, large passageways, marble spiral staircase and bar in the ground floor.

name: Princeps Boutique Hotel
description: Princeps Boutique Hotel occupies the fourth floor of one of the most elegant palaces of the historical Monti district, the first district in the heart of Rome. The majestic Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore stands right in front of the property. The warm and intimate reception/lobby (24h) and offices, introduce a unique breakfast room, divided in three environments and open to guests beyond the usual morning hours, so as to be suitable for a business meeting or as a reading room. Every morning you can start your day with a buffet-style breakfast including fresh fruit, bakery croissants and cakes as well as cold cuts, eggs and cheese. The hotel has 20 soundproofed rooms, all non-smoking, and diversified with and without views. Most rooms overlook the Basilica or the characteristic Monti area and the entire monumental Rome. The rooms, decorated in soft colors, specially chosen fabrics, hand-painted woodwork, beautiful floors and customized furnishings offer marble bathrooms with large shower, satellite TV, free wi-fi throughout the property, large size safe, mini-bar, air conditioned with individual control, hairdryer, and luxury toiletries. As a special Grand Opening promotion, free national and international phone calls are included in room fee. The hotel is located in a privileged and strategic position just 500 meters from Termini Station and even less from the subway stop Cavour. Princeps Boutique Hotel is in the centre of Rome's most authentic, lively district, where a continuous bustle of Romans and tourists - including shops, restaurants, wine bars, cafes, bakeries and boutiques - where the alleys are animated by countless picturesque views.

Completely renovated, the Hotel della Conciliazione is composed of 67 rooms elegantly furnished and completely equipped with air conditioning , private bathroom with bath or shower , free Wi - fi , LCD TV with major satellite channels , mini bar and direct dial telephone. A bar and a restaurant where organize business meetings or events , and a young multilingual staff with customer-oriented attitude, will be dedicated to satisfy every need of our guests with suggestions for any necessity they may have regarding restaurants , City tours , transfers to the airport or to the city and any other service that will grant them an unforgettable stay in Rome with us . A Rich Home made Buffet Breakfast served for our guests every day , will offer a wide selection of "zero kilometers"products , gluten free, carefully selected to ensure a healthy choice for a complete breakfast . Even your children can enjoy a special breakfast with products designed specifically for them . The property is 10 minutes far, walking distance, from the metro station Ottaviano ( line A ) and from the station of San Pietro , directly connected though trains to / from Fiumicino Airport ( main airport of the city of Rome) . OUR SERVICES The brand new Hotel completely renovated to offer innovative technologies without in the charming atmosphere of a historic building , has an ancient well preserved facade , interior design refined , elegant furnishings and 67 rooms and junior suites completed equipped to offer all the services to satisfy any necessity with us during your stay : wi -fi connection, LCD TV with major satellite channels , mini bar , air conditioning , direct dial telephone . name: citizenM Miami Brickell Hotel
description:
citizenM Miami Brickell is not only the first citizenM hotel in Miami - it's also our first ever with a swimming pool! In a city with all-year sunshine, we want to give the guests something extra special to enjoy, in addition to our usual fabulous design, smart bedrooms and contactless stays. The swimming pool is located outdoors on the rooftop, together with a fitness room and indoor/outdoor bar. For business travellers, the hotel will have 8 stylish and inspiring meeting rooms, available for booking anytime - AM, PM, all day and on weekends. citizenM hotels are in a category all on their own - affordable luxury. This means guests don't pay for the usual hotel cliches (like chocolates on pillows), but instead they enjoy all hotel essentials of the highest quality: beds, showers, entertainment, guest service, efficiency and more. Instead of a lobby, citizenM Miami Brickell will feature the fabulous (signature) living room instead of a lifeless lobby. In the living room: world-class art, colourful designer furniture, dozens of books, and 24/7 food within an arm's reach - just like at home. The citizenM living rooms are perfect for work, rest and play - with a craft cocktail in hand, of course. Every citizenM bedroom is optimised for maximum relaxation and designed for maximum 2 adults. All bedrooms are the same, so all guests enjoy the same luxury. In each bedroom: XL king-size bed with luxury European bedding and fluffy pillows, walk-in shower with jungle-like water pressure, full-size shower gels, flatscreen TV with entertainment and streaming capabilities, and superfast free Wi-Fi. Our hot & cold breakfast buffet comes with unique local treats, familiar favorites, and healthy options for everyone — including vegans and vegetarians. Pile your plate with warm pastries, scrambled eggs, fresh fruit, and more. 

citizenM Miami Brickell hotel has a rooftop pool! Access to the pool is for hotel guests only. All guests receive a tote bag, water bottle, a free welcome drink (alcohol for 21+ only), and access to private beach in South Beach (including two beach chairs and towels).

name: The Charles Hotel
description: N intimate ambiance and excellent service. Occupying a historic medieval building, the charming Charles Hotel has been beautifully restored whilst retaining many of its original features. The Charles Hotel is situated close to The Charles Bridge. Surrounded by good selection of bars and restaurants, this intimate property enjoys a romantic ambiance. Located in the charming historical district of Prague Mala Strana (also called Prague Lesser Town or Little Quarter of Prague) and close to the famous Charles Bridge, Prague Castle, romantic Kampa, Petrin parks and just across the bridge to the rest of Old Town. The Hotel Charles is part of the Royal Road, which starts in Nuremberg (Germany) and leads all the way to Prague Castle through the Powder Tower, Wenceslas Square and across Charles Bridge. All 31 rooms of our hotel are air conditioned. 25 Rooms and 6 suites are reflecting the building's rich heritage and providing our guests with comfortable accommodation, an exceptional service and modern amenities. Baroque-style rooms include satellite television, minibar, in-room safe and hairdryer. Breakfast room and lobby bar are necessary to make you feel special. Friendly, attentive staff and a perfect location make it an excellent choice. The Charles hotel is romantic accommodation in the middle of Prague history!

description:
Looking for a place to stay in Las Vegas? Then look no further than The Palazzo Resort Hotel Casino, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Las Vegas to your doorstep.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as The Palazzo Resort Hotel Casino offers guests free internet access.
The hotel features a concierge and room service. Plus, Palazzo Las Vegas Reviews offers a pool and breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
Close to some of Las Vegas' most popular landmarks, such as Mirage Volcano (0.3 mi) and The LINQ Promenade (0.4 mi), The Palazzo Resort Hotel Casino is a great destination for tourists.
When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Ellis Island BBQ, Rollin Smoke Barbeque, and Hobak Korean BBQ, which are some barbeque restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out High Roller (0.4 mi), The Strip (0.8 mi), or Bellagio Fountains (0.9 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Palazzo Resort Hotel Casino as you experience everything Las Vegas has to offer.

name: Hotel Milano Scala
description: Hotel Milano Scala is a Green Boutique Hotel that combines sophisticated hospitality and eco-sustainability. We are the first hotel in Milan and one of the few in Italy with ZERO EMISSIONS, thanks to a heat pump systems that exploit geothermal energy and allow the reduction of CO2 emissions to the outside. Furthermore, thanks to highly technological filters that capture polluting agents, the hotel offers its guests a healthier indoor air quality, with more than 80% reduction of fine dust. Thanks to these two features, the hotel has been included in the prestigious National Geographic Traveller UK Earth Collection 2019, which brings together the 36 most eco-friendly hotels in the world (we are the only one in all Italy). We also have a panoramic terrace that offers a 360° view over Milan, where we serve refined green cocktails inspired by the products of the rooftop garden on the sixth floor (vegetables, fruit, aromatic herbs and edible flowers). The hotel is also inspired by classical and Opera music: the tradition of the Teatro alla Scala can be felt everywhere in the hotel, especially during breakfast, always served with a live concert of harp or piano. Our location in the heart of Brera district allows our Guests to reach the most important points of interest in Milan in a few minutes, both on foot and by metro, thanks to the proximity of 3 metro lines (Cairoli MM1 Red Line, Lanza MM2 Green Line, Montenapoleone MM3 Yellow Line).

M1 Cairoli and Cordusio underground stations are just a 2-minute walk away and the M1/M3 Duomo station is 5 minutes away. This hotel in the centre of Milan is close to the most famous shopping streets such as Via Monte Napoleone, the Quadrilatero della Moda and Piazza San Babila. name: Uptown Palace
description: The Uptown Palace is a 4-star superior business hotel in Milan. It is modern and elegant and situated a short walk from the Missori metro stop (yellow line), from Piazza Duomo and from Milan's famous shopping streets. The carefully chosen and highly qualified multilingual staff guarantee high levels of service and care for every guest. The Uptown Palace has 165 fully soundproofed rooms. Floors in the rooms are parquet or carpet while those in the public areas are marble. Each room has LCD televisions and en suite bathrooms with shower or bathtub, together with fluffy robes, slippers, hairdryers and a stylish selection of toiletries. The Presidential Suite and four of the Executive suites have an atmospheric view of the Duomo and of the rooftops of busy Milan. Uptown Palace offers its guests a destination par excellence where every dream can come true.

name: Hotel Da Vinci
description: L’Hotel Da Vinci Milano è un albergo a 4 stelle, con 307 camere, situato in via Senigallia 6. Il complesso si trova proprio alle porte di Milano, a 150 metri dalla stazione di Bruzzano e circa un chilometro dalla metropolitana Comasina (MM3 – Linea Gialla). Per raggiungere il centro città è possibile prendere il treno dalla stazione di Bruzzano a quella di Cadorna e poi fare 3 fermate di metropolitana (MM1 – Linea Rossa) da Cadorna a Duomo oppure prendere la metro MM3 – Linea Gialla da Comasina a Duomo per 11 fermate. In alternativa, si può prendere la linea S2 o S4 delle Ferrovie Nord dalla stazione di Bruzzano o l’autobus 41 a pochi passi dall’hotel, scendere ad Affori e prendere la metropolitana MM3 – Linea Gialla fino a Duomo per 10 fermate. L’albergo dispone di un bar, un ristorante e un centro congressi con 12 sale riunioni; ogni camera è dotata di aria condizionata, riscaldamento, insonorizzazione, moquette, minibar, cassaforte, TV a schermo piatto, canali satellitari, scrivania, telefono, sveglia telefonica, armadio o guardaroba, biancheria per la casa, soluzioni anallergiche, Wi-Fi gratis e un bagno privato, decorato con piastrelle a mosaico, con vasca o doccia, asciugacapelli, asciugamani e prodotti da bagno in omaggio.

name: The Corner Hotel
description:
The Corner Hotel is located at 178 Mallorca Street, in the heart of the city, in the Eixample district at the intersection of Mallorca and Muntaner streets. This unbeatable location puts the hotel just a few minutes' walk from many of Barcelona's landmarks such as Avinguda Diagonal, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, home to the city's famous modernist gems, including La Pedrera and Casa Batlló.

The Corner offers a total of 72 rooms that combine elegance and functionality with a touch of industrial design. All rooms are fully equipped with the latest technology, plus Wi-Fi Internet connection, safe, Smart TV, piped music and Bluetooth connection, individual climate control, pillow menu, minibar, kettle and welcome mineral water.

In addition, it has a range of services to meet any need, such as online check-in, 24-hour reception, laundry service, room service, business center, meeting room, luggage room, private parking, and adapted access and spaces.

Its leisure spaces stand out. On the first floor is The Tangram Bar, a different, open space, a meeting point for guests and locals. A place to enjoy the first coffee, have a light lunch or the last tapa of the night. On the seventh floor is an oasis in the heart of Barcelona that allows you to take refuge from the hustle and bustle of the city and relax enjoying the solarium, the outdoor pool and the Rooftop Bar.

Enjoy your stay in Barcelona!

name: Hotel Cuatro Naciones
description: Quite affordable in light of its extremely central location on Las Ramblas, the Hotel Cuatro Naciones in Barcelona has been providing basic rooms for more than 300 years . Turn-of-the century style unfolds in a lobby decked out with high crown molding, wrought ironwork, and marble galore. ... Read MoreA sweeping staircase leads to 54 simplistic rooms with white walls and punchy pink bedspreads and curtains. Floors are smooth stone mosaic. There's also an elevator, if stairs aren't your thing. Fourteen of the rooms at the Hotel Cuatro Naciones offer sweeping views of La Rambla. The first floor salon is a must-see, featuring hotel-related news clippings through the ages and signed photos and memorabilia of the hotel's most famous guests. The fancy guest history includes Stendhal, Frederic-Francois Chopin, Ulysses S. Grant, and Buffalo Bill.

name: Hotel Colon
description: There are certain pleasures that are only available to those that stay at the Hotel Colón. For example, waking up early in the morning, crossing over to the window, pulling aside the curtains, and seeing the image of the Barcelona Cathedral bathed in the sun’s first rays. It’s an image that will fill you with energy throughout the whole day! Many of our 129 rooms in the hotel offer this privilege, in addition to amenities such as air-conditioning, telephone, LCD television with international channels, high-speed Internet, safety deposit box, a well-stocked mini-bar, and the finishing touches of a 4 star hotel. If you are traveling for leisure, after a nice shower and a full breakfast, you’ll find it convenient to have the main tourist attractions within walking distance. If you are traveling for professional reasons, having two ample lounges at your disposal offers you infinite options for any event, convention, business meeting, or celebration. In both cases, it’s good to know that, for lunch or dinner, you can depend on the excellent service at the Cathedral 1951 restaurant. All of these reasons make a stay at the Hotel Colón unforgettable. What more can you ask of a hotel?

name: Hotel Astoria
description: Are you looking for an elegant, central and modern hotel for your business trips or relaxing getaways? name: nhow Amsterdam RAI
description: The nhow Amsterdam RAI is located in the thriving business district of Zuidas in Amsterdam. Designed by leading architect Reinier de Graaf, the hotel will be located next to the RAI Convention Center, with easy subway access to Amsterdam’s main attractions. The 24 floor hotel has 650 rooms, all with floor-to-ceiling windows and views across the city. The hotel’s 650 newly built rooms, inspired by the six cardinal faces of the hotel, are modern and light, with floor-to-ceiling windows. The pet-friendly rooms feature (N)espresso coffee machines, flat-screen TVs, digital safes, a minibar, and complimentary Wi-Fi. The junior suite have jacuzzi and the presidential suite on the 21st floor features a terrace. A buffet breakfast offering both continental and American options is served daily, with a bar on the first floor for relaxation. Guests can enjoy gourmet food in the 17th floor restaurant, complete with three terraces. Gluten-free and vegetarian options are available. The hotel offers comprehensive conference facilities, complete with audio-visual equipment, for up to 350 attendees. Guests are offered complimentary access to the fully equipped gym lounges. An experienced team of guest relations professionals provide excellent service.

Due to its central location, you will find many touristic and cultural sites within walking distance. Hotel Die Port van Cleve has a rich history. Hulscher's restaurant is famous for its numbered steaks and Bar-Bodega ‘De Blauwe Parade’ has an unique Delft blue tile fresco dating from 1887. The rooms are decorated with references to the authentic tile fresco in the bar. In 2020 due to its 150 anniversary around 20 rooms were renovated and are now themed with one of our six memorable moments. The ground floor is entirely renovated.

name: Park Plaza Victoria Amsterdam
description:
Located in the heart of the city, opposite Amsterdam Central Station, Park Plaza Victoria Amsterdam occupies a historic 19th-century building in the heart of Amsterdam’s shopping district, just a five-minute stroll from Dam Square and the Royal Palace. The hotel is the perfect base from which to explore legendary cultural attractions such as the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum and Anne Frank House, as well as the atmospheric canal network.

The hotel’s 298 contemporary Superior Rooms, Executive Rooms and suites offer spacious and contemporary accommodation for everyone from solo travellers to extended families. Recognised with prestigious Les Clefs D’Or status, Park Plaza Victoria Amsterdam’s concierge team offers personalised itineraries.

At the front of the hotel, you’ll find VIC’s BAR which serves tempting homemade pastries and freshly brewed coffee accompanied by a smooth jazz soundtrack. A wide selection of international spirits, local beers and enticing à la carte dishes are also available for lunch and dinner. Room service available.

The hotel also features an impressive health club with a modern fitness centre and indoor swimming pool.

name: SO/ Vienna
description: SO/ VIENNA is centrally located in downtown, which today has a thriving creative scene. The hotel boasts spectacular views of the inner city and the St. Stephens cathedral. In front of the hotel you have prime access to the Donaukanal, a popular stretch along the river that attracts sun-hungry locals in the summer. Your stroll takes you past the sights in the Old Town and the docks of the Twin City Liner - a speed boat to Bratislava. All rooms feature breathtaking uninterrupted views over the city of Vienna, 40" HD TV, Rain Shower, Bathtub, Nespresso Coffee & Tea, complimentary Mini-bar, BOSE Sound System & Air Play. name: Zoku Vienna
description: Located within 4.7 km of Vienna Central Station, Zoku Vienna is designed for professionals, business travelers and remote workers who are on the lookout for a high-design and sustainable apartment hotel for 1 day, to 1 month to 1 year. Zoku Vienna features 131 Lofts: private apartment-style rooms that contain a lofted bed, living room, kitchen, bathroom and large 4-person table. The award-winning Zoku Loft is a spacious micro-apartment equally suited for living and working. It is designed for inviting friends and colleagues into your home, working across multiple time zones or getting any job done while exploring the city. Each Loft sleeps two and comes equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and free high-speed Wi-Fi. You can even personalize your space by choosing your favorite artwork to hang on the walls for inspiration during your stay. When you feel like leaving your private room to socialize, our rooftop Social Spaces on the 7th floor feature the Living Room, Kindred Spirits Bar, Living Kitchen restaurant, Coworking Spaces, Meeting Rooms, Event Space, and a spacious terrace to cater to all the fun and practical needs of Zoku's international mix of residents. The windows throughout the rooftop offer plenty of natural daylight, giving you a much-needed break from the hustle and bustle of the city and a one-of-a-kind view of the Prater. The shared spaces are accessible 24/7, with an on-site team of ‘Sidekicks’ to support you during your stay. Vienna Central Station is 4 metro stops away and there is a direct metro connection to important business districts and historical sites. Bike rentals are also available and the Prater is 200 m from Zoku. The nearest airport is Schwechat Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Boutiquehotel Das Tyrol
description: What do you need to feel at home in a hotel? Certainly, first-class quality and excellent service are at the top of the list. These things are a matter of course here at the 4-star hotel Das Tyrol. Of course, individuality is crucial; charm that is exceptional. That signature feature that makes something distinctive, unique even. In our case, the individual uniqueness is art or rather the bridge that combines art with history, tradition, and modernity. Art-minded and individual A guest from London wrote in our guestbook. „This is our Schatzkammer“. And we are very proud of this, because we know he means art. He means our service. He means the dedication of our entire team. He means our whole hotel. Experience this special mixture of art, culture, and charming hospitality. We look forward to seeing you! Helena Ramsbacher and the entire team at Das Tyrol
hotelClassAttribution: This property is officially classified according to Hotelstars Union standards.

roomTips.text: Check out the area’s restaurants close by. Many, especially Stella Marina (Italian) were exceptional.

name: MEININGER Hotel Wien Downtown Franz
description: Booking is subject to availability. The MEININGER Hotel Wien Downtown Franz is in Vienna's second district of Leopoldstadt between Augarten and the Danube canal. The Karmeliter market with its many delicacies and Vienna's Old Town are just around the corner. The Franz hotel with its functional and modern design is ideal for city breaks that call for simplicity and precision. With services such as free WiFi, guest kitchen, bar and gaming area... holidaying with MEININGER is more than just low-cost accommodation. Our rooms are professionally cleaned and disinfected before every arrival. Please note: With our initiative "Mindful by nature" your room is only being cleaned upon request during your stay. If you wish to have your room cleaned, simply let us know at reception. Shared rooms are being cleaned daily.

name: ibis Styles Wien City Hotel
description:
Welcome to Ibis Styles Wien City Hotel, your Vienna “home away from home.” Ibis Styles Wien City Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Vienna, Ibis Styles Wien City Hotel is located a short distance from Rathaus (1.5 mi) and St. Peter's Church (1.8 mi).
Rooms at Ibis Styles Wien City Hotel provide a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a desk, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Ibis Styles Wien City Hotel guests have access to a 24 hour front desk and baggage storage. You can also enjoy breakfast. Need a place to park? Parking is available at Ibis Styles Wien City Hotel.
While in Vienna, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Ibis Styles Wien City Hotel, including Gasthaus Rebhuhn (1.1 mi), Der Wiener Deewan (1.1 mi), and Kim Kocht (0.7 mi).
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Sigmund Freud Museum (1.1 mi), Votivkirche (1.2 mi), and District Heating Plant Spittelau (0.3 mi), which are some popular Vienna attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
Ibis Styles Wien City Hotel puts the best of Vienna at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
hotelClassAttribution: This property is officially classified according to Hotelstars Union standards.

name: Hotel Kaiserhof Wien
description: The KAISERHOF was built in 1896 (last partial renovation 2016/17). The familiar, private running hotel is located in a quiet area, close to the historical heart of Vienna. The State Opera House, St. Stephans Cathedral and the Naschmarkt are nearby. Bus, Tram and Metro-Station nearby. The natural friendliness of the staff, best quality service, and real love of detail give the hotel a unique attractive ambience. Tradition and the modernity combine here with true Austrian charme! Breakfast-Buffet also offers GLUTEN- and LACTOSE-FREE products. 74 Rooms on 6 floors. For our guests who suffer in allergies, the KAISERHOF Wien offers "allergy-friendly" rooms - which are furbished and designed to the needs for people who suffer from allergies. Categories: Petit, Classic, Business, Madame, Allergy-friendly, Superior, Junior-Suites, Suites, KAISERHOF Suite and the ADMIRAL Suite. Free WiFi, public garage nearby. All rooms are equpiped with AC & a minibar. Small Wellness-Area. KAISERHOF Wien a NON-Smoking Hotel.

name: Generator Venice
description: Generator Venice stands on the waterfront of the island of Giudecca, one shortstop on the Vapporetto from Piazza San Marco. Our Venice hotel was originally a warehouse, so the building blends history and character with contemporary design features. Inside the hotel, you’ll find luxurious mosaic floors, a glass chandelier, and an imposing stone fireplace. Public spaces are subtly split into intimate and open-plan areas – all surrounding the bar and cafe. Every room has a view of either the gardens, Lido, Grande Canal, or the iconic San Marco. Not bad, eh? -- Please note that due to the global pandemic, some venues, amenities, and services may have been eliminated or scaled down for the safety of our guests and staff. Please contact the hotel should you have any questions or concerns.

name: Hotel Firenze
description:
See why so many travelers make Hotel Firenze their hotel of choice when visiting Venice. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Nearby landmarks such as Scala Contarini del Bovolo (0.1 mi) and Peggy Guggenheim Collection (0.3 mi) make Hotel Firenze a great place to stay when visiting Venice.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Hotel Firenze features a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and a concierge. In addition, as a valued Albergo Firenze Hotel guest, you can enjoy free breakfast that is available on-site.
When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Gelateria Sommariva, which is a French restaurant that is popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
Venice is also known for some great marinas, including Riva degli Schiavoni and Malamocco, which are not too far from Albergo Firenze Hotel.
At Hotel Firenze, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Venice.
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

name: Hotel Carlton on the Grand Canal
description: Elegant and welcoming, the Hotel Carlton on the Grand Canal has been run with passion for approximately 30 years by a Venetian family which loves to pay its guests attention, by providing them with valuable advise on how to capture the city’s true essence.Pastel shades, Venetian stuccoes, glass wall lamps made in Murano, furnishings which, while being functional, recall the glorious Serenissima epoch: these are the elements of the new hall and bar, completely mirrored on marvellous Istria stone. Right at the centre of the hotel is an original glass cupola creating light effects which highlight its sophistication. The recently restored, characteristic internal patio onto which some of the rooms look out and where guests can enjoy breakfast or relax, using it as a peaceful open-air lounge, has a notable impact on guests. The elegant Bar Carlton Café offers you the chance to taste excellent drinks and whet your appetite with unusual snacks both in the internal room and in the open-air, enjoying an unforgettable stay on the Grand Canal.The hotel also offers its guests outstanding opportunities to discover all of Venice’s magic, by organizing personalised itineraries and excursions: boat tours to the lagoon islands, guided tours of the city, romantic itineraries followes by a candle lit dinner and much more. For further information on “special” packages, check out our online booking now or send your request to our booking centre.For conferences and meetings we can provide the “Galileo” room, fitted with update equipment and capable of holding up to 60 people.Some of the services offered to our guests include: free entry to the Casino, free baggage surveillance, baby-sitting, restaurant booking, theatre and concert tickets.Restaurant “La Cupola”Elegant reflections, inviting aromas, brilliant colours and exclusive tastes: these are the defining features of our restaurant “La Cupola”, a jewel of refined style in newly renovated surroundings, boasting harmony in its menu selections inspired both by innovative cuisine, as well as the genuine traditions of the territory.The distinct, welcoming atmosphere and the fine cuisine will envelop you and capture you, transforming your “mealtime” into an exceptional experience.You will be greeted with warmth and courtesy, and given expert advice on your menu selections.The typical and international specialties are served with refined simplicity, elegant and genuine at the same time, accompanied by an exclusive wine list. Our Maitre, Filippo Nocerino, will be at your disposition for any special requests.Perfect for any occassion or simply for a romantic evening, our restaurant “La Cupola” will live up to your expectations and your appetites!TOP OF THE CARLTON SKY LUNGE & RESTAURANTLet “Time Out” steer you upwards to the finest sky lounge in Venice for enjoying cocktails in the clouds and Grand Canal view dining .Stylish evenings begin and end at TOP OF THE CARLTON, the rooftop terrace perched on the 4th floor of the Carlton on the Grand Canal Hotel. Impressive views from this spacious terrace take in both the ancient majesty of the Grand Canal and its noble palaces and the modern Constitution bridge, the newest structure that pierces the motley Venice skyline full of domes, bell towers, arches and spires.Choose from a multitude of cocktails, snacks and light-dining while you sit and enjoy a romantic sunset or experience the gentle lapping of the Grand Canal waters as a gondola passes by.When it’s time to unwind and relax, choose Top of the Carlton.TOP OF THE CARLTON can be exclusively reserved for private events and functions, such as wedding receptions, birthday parties, corporate events – in fact the sky is the limit.Open from mid May to end of September, weather permitting.
localName: Hotel Carlton on the Grand Canal

name: Hotel Dalla Mora
description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Venice does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Dalla Mora, a nice option for travelers like you.
Close to some of Venice's most popular landmarks, such as Peggy Guggenheim Collection (0.6 mi) and Scala Contarini del Bovolo (0.6 mi), Hotel Dalla Mora is a great destination for tourists.
Rooms at Hotel Dalla Mora provide a desk, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Hotel Dalla Mora guests have access to baggage storage. You can also enjoy free breakfast.
If you’re looking for a seafood restaurant, consider a visit to Bistrot de Venise, Paradiso Perduto, or Antiche Carampane, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Hotel Dalla Mora.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular military museums such as Museo Storico Militare Di Forte Marghera.
Hotel Dalla Mora looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Venice.

name: Hotel Saturnia & International Venezia
description: Hotel Saturnia & International is a four-star superior hotel that enjoys a strategic position, nestled in Venice heart nearby St. Mark’s Square and La Fenice Theatre. It evokes a truly charming atmosphere being partly a 14th century palace, thanks to its unique Venetian style. Tradition, quality and high-level service make the hotel Saturnia & International be one of the most charming places in Venice, where to be hugged by the historic setting and elegantly exquisite furnishings. Since 1908 owned and run by the Serandrei family, the Saturnia & International is a exclusive family-run hotel that represents today a magnificent fascination of the past along with all contemporary amenities of a modern life: TV, air con, minibar, free WI-FI and others. The hotel can be easily reached by private water taxi thanks its private pier or by public water bus. Guests can relax and recharge their energy in a brand new Gym & SPA area as well as a rooftop terrace with a breathtaking view over the Salute Church.

name: Hotel Concordia
description: The Hotel Concordia, in the heart of Venice, is the only Hotel overlooking Piazza San Marco. The Beggiato Family has been running the hotel for four generations as its own home, giving the place a warm atmosphere and distinguished elegance. The 51 rooms, all furnished with original antique furniture, Murano chandeliers, marble bathrooms or precious Venetian mosaic are all equipped with all the best modern technologies in order to satisfy the most demanding requirements. Most of the rooms offer a breathtaking view over the spires and the mosaics of the Basilica and over Piazza San Marco. As a Canaletto painting the San Marco Basilica is the background of the exclusive Cocktail Bar “La Piazzetta”, the ideal setting to enjoy a drink in the charming elegant bar lounge.

name: Hotel Olimpia Venice, BW Signature Collection
description: OLIMPIA HOTEL The hotel is located in the most convenient area of the historical centre of Venice.Facing a typical canal, close to the Basilica dei Frari, the School of San Rocco, a few minutes walking from the Grand Canal and the famous Rialto Bridge.The location of the Best Western Hotel Olimpia allows you to easily reach the Bus Terminal of Piazzale Roma ( 100 meters ), from where you can get public or private transportations to the Airport ( shuttle bus or taxi ), Cruise Terminal ( the monorail fast train People Mover ), train station ( 10 minutes walking or just 1 stop by waterbus )The Hotel has been recently and totally renewed, making our services more inviting: Reading Room, Bar, free WI-FI, internet point and a charming garden. name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham LAX
description: Conveniently located less than a mile from one of the world's busiest airports and within five miles of Manhattan Beach, the ten-story La Quinta Inn & Suites LAX is a welcoming oasis for travel weary guests. Just off the 405 Freeway, this full-service hotel features an onsite restaurant (American menu only, open 11am-10pm), an outdoor pool with sundeck, fitness center, and meeting/banquet facilities for up to 300 guests. Wireless high-speed Internet access is available throughout the hotel as well. We have free 24-hour airport shuttle service and also offer Stay and Go parking rates at this hotel. To obtain the shuttle at the airport, simply proceed to the lower transportation level and wait on the center isle under the red “Hotel Courtesy Shuttle” sign. Our shuttle runs every 15-20 minutes. There is no need to reserve the shuttle in advance, as it runs 24-hours a day. Our spacious guest rooms and suites feature convenient amenities pillow-top mattresses, like free wireless high-speed Internet access, a coffee maker, free local calls, voicemail, and premium cable TV channels. Microwaves and refrigerators are also available by request. Take advantage of the hotel's free Bright Side Breakfast served each morning. Parking is available for a nominal fee. Registered guests $20 per day. Visitors $23 per day.
address: 5249 W Century Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90045-5917

name: The Delaney Hotel
description: A Respite from the Ordinary is our tagline, and that’s what we do. We invite you to take a break from your typical 9-to-5 and pamper yourself with lush accommodations, swanky service, and convivial ambiance at South Orlando’s newest boutique hotel. Stay in one of our 54 individually stylized, decked-out guestrooms and suites, or grab a cold microbrew with some flavorful fare at our New American tavern. The Delaney Hotel's boutique accommodations feature innovative designs – oversized rooms, walk-in showers, room service – combined with advanced technologies – in-room tablets, digital concierge, mobile keys, in-room automation, bathroom mirrors with integrated clocks, 55" Samsung TV’s, as well as our state-of-the-art fitness center and business center. Guests will also enjoy a meal at Delaney’s Tavern. Have an event planned? Use our private dining room/event space accommodating up to 100 guests. And there’s no surprise that you can pull up and plug into a complimentary Tesla or Universal Charger and enjoy your stay! The Delaney Hotel + Delaney’s Tavern is hospitality reimagined.

name: Rosen Shingle Creek
description:
Set at the headwaters of the Florida Everglades, Rosen Shingle Creek is a stunning 255-acre luxury escape located on Universal Boulevard just a half-mile from the Orange County Convention Center and minutes away from the Universal Orlando Resort™, SeaWorld® Orlando, and Walt Disney World® Resort.

With no resort fees, our 1,501 smoke-free guestrooms (including 195 suites and a club-level lounge) are situated within our 14-story building. ADA-compliant and dog-friendly guestrooms are available. Complimentary Wi-Fi internet access is provided throughout the entire hotel. Valet and self-parking are offered for an additional cost in our securely gated parking lot. 

Exquisite dishes are prepared in 15 restaurants and lounges including the award-winning steakhouse A Land Remembered and fine-dining Italian bistro Cala Bella. An elaborate buffet awaits at Café Osceola with a Kids Eat Free program. Other dining offerings include Tobias Burgers & Brews, Mi Casa Tequila Taqueria, Banrai Sushi, Headwaters Lounge, Shingle Creek Clubhouse Grille, Cat-Tails Pool Bar & Grille, Par-Take, Smoooth Java Coffee Bar, Creek Ice Creamery, 18 Monroe Street Market, and 24-hour room service.

Amenities include the 18-hole Shingle Creek Golf Club, Academy, & Pro Shop, 4 seasonally-heated swimming pools with cabanas, 2 hot tubs, spa & salon services at The Spa at Shingle Creek, boutique shopping, fitness center, fishing, tennis/basketball/sand volleyball courts, nature trail, video game arcade, concierge/tour/bell services desks, laundry room, and laundry/dry cleaning services. Over 524,000 square feet of meeting and event space is available - complete with on-site A/V services, catering, and a RICOH Business Center.

As a Universal Partner Hotel, complimentary scheduled shuttle service is provided to the Universal Orlando Resort™ as well as SeaWorld® Orlando and Aquatica® Orlando. Other transportation options may also be arranged for a fee upon arrival.

name: Rosen Inn at Pointe Orlando
description:
Rosen Inn at Pointe Orlando is situated on International Drive across from The Pointe Orlando and near the Orange County Convention Center. We are minutes away from the Universal Orlando Resort™, SeaWorld® Orlando, and Walt Disney World® Resort.

Our deluxe 1,020 smoke-free guestrooms are located in seven buildings across 26 lush, tropical acres featuring no resort fees and complimentary self-parking in our securely gated parking lot. Free Wi-Fi internet access is also available throughout the entire hotel.

All guestrooms are appointed with Simmons Beautyrest® pillow-top mattresses with plush foam pillows, a 32" flat screen HDTV with premium cable channels, a radio alarm clock, a mini-refrigerator, a microwave, a coffee/tea maker, an iron, an ironing board, a hair dryer, a writing desk, an electronic safe large enough to accommodate a laptop computer, and a private bathroom with a separate vanity area.

ADA-compliant and dog-friendly guestrooms are available.

Onsite dining options include Plaza Garden Restaurant serving a breakfast and dinner buffet daily with a Kids Eat Free program. Enjoy a la carte entrees and adult beverages evenings at Zebra's Bar and Lounge. Smoooth Java Coffee Bar & Gifts™ proudly serves Starbucks® coffee and other treats. Guests may also purchase snacks, drinks, and sundries at Lite Bite Mini-Market & Deli.

Our property has three swimming pools (two are seasonally heated), a fitness center, self-service laundries, a video arcade game room, and an outdoor playground. Meeting/conference facilities and a business center are also available.

As a Universal Partner Hotel, complimentary scheduled shuttle service is provided to the Universal Orlando Resort™ as well as SeaWorld® Orlando and Aquatica® Orlando. Other transportation options may also be purchased at our Guest Services Desk upon arrival.

name: Hotel Adlon Kempinski Berlin

Das Hotel Adlon Kempinski zieht seine Gäste mit seinem bemerkenswert warmherzigen Europäischem Flair und herausragendem Service schon seit 1907 in seinen Bann. name: IntercityHotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof
description: In October 2013, we have opened our biggest IntercityHotel right in the middle of the pulsating metropolis Berlin, set directly at the main station. Within spitting distance, you can find some excitement here in the beautiful city centre with its important sights like the Federal Chancellery, the Reichstag, the Brandenburg Gate, the shopping centre Friedrichstrasse or the legendary Ku'damm. From the centrally located IntercityHotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof, you find the best connections to all forms of local public transport within walking distance. Therefore, you can reach all of the interesting parts and sights of the city in no time. Regardless of whether you are in the city on business or for pleasure, you will immediately feel at home in one of our 412 delightfully furnished rooms with their modern colour concept. All the rooms are designed in warm brown and beige tones and topped off with stylish accents in terra cotta. Why not start the new day with a great range of delicious breakfast treats available from our sumptuous breakfast buffet. For the remaining meals you will certainly find something tasty in our restaurant or Bistro Lounge. It is our utmost pleasure to welcome all our guests in a warm and friendly manner, as with pleasure we strive to create a superb experience to all our clients visiting Berlin. For all IntercityHotels concerned the usage of the WLAN is free of charge up to 256 KB/s. (Parking fee from 01.01.2017: 25€)

name: Mercure Hotel MOA Berlin
description: Welcome to the Mercure MOA Berlin! Our hotel, located in the beautiful Berlin "Tiergarten", is very easy to reach thanks to its proximity to Berlin's government district, the central station, "Kurfürstendamm" avenue and the airport. Sights and attractions such as the Brandenburg Gate, the Reichstag building are in close proximity and convenient to visit. At our hotel you will find 336 comfortable, non-smoking rooms, with air conditioning, a tea and coffee station, free Wi-Fi access. Our cosy restaurant will spoil you with culinary treats from morning till night, and afterwards you can spend a relaxing evening at our hotel bar. At the heart of our hotel you will find a 1,600 square metre atrium with green paces. For planing your event, you can choose between business suites, conference and event rooms as well as our 2,200 square metre Convention Hall. Over a total area of 6,000 square metres, we have space for up to 6,500 people. We wish you a pleasant stay!

name: Hotel Central Basilica
description: Located in the heart of Budapest downtown, 50m far from the St. Stephen’s Basilica and 2 minutes by walk from the Deák Ferenc sguare metro station. Next to the M1, M2, M3 metro lines the Budapest Eye and Fashion Street are also in our neighborhood. This neonclassicist hotel was opened in 2007 also has free Wi-Fi access. All rooms at Hotel Central Basilica are feature air conditioning, a TV, a laptop-size safe, tea and coffee making facilities, wardrobe and a work desk. The private bathroom comprises a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy rich and varied buffet breakfast from fresh and selected ingredients. Mineral water is provided free of charge in the rooms. Speaking both English and Hungarian staff at the 24-hour reception can also help with information on tickets to attractions and shows. The pedestrian shopping area Váci Utca is within 700m, while Sas Utca, a street with numerous bars, cafés and restaurants can be reached in 400 m. Dohány Street Synagogue is 15 minutes by walk.

name: Medos Hotel
description: See why so many travelers make Medos Hotel their hotel of choice when visiting Budapest. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a quiet setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you. While staying at Medos Hotel, visitors can check out Heroes' Square (1.0 mi) and Fisherman's Bastion (1.3 mi), some of Budapest's top attractions. Rooms at Medos Hotel provide a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available. In addition, Medos Hotel offers an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Budapest trip additionally gratifying. Budapest has plenty of Italian restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like New York Cafe, Vintage Garden, and Comme Chez Soi, which are serving up some great dishes. If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Parliament (0.7 mi), St. Stephen's Basilica (Szent Istvan Bazilika) (0.5 mi), or Buda Castle (1.2 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance. At Medos Hotel, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Budapest.

name: Hotel Palazzo Guadagni
description: Palazzo Guadagni, with its unique Loggia, is an iconic landmark of the Oltrarno, the most vibrant and characteristic neighbourhood of the city. Located on the upper floor of this ancient palazzo built in 1505, Hotel Palazzo Guadagni offers iconic views on the main monuments of Florence and its surrounding hills. With elegant rooms, beautifully decorated with antique furniture and frescoed ceilings, Palazzo Guadagni is the perfect destination to live an authentic Florentine experience. The Hotel benefits of a splendid terrace, the Loggia, that offers an idyllic panorama of Florence. An exceptional location where you can find your own peace within the city, breathing in the authenticity and the timeless beauty of Florence. Located in Santo Spirito square, the hotel is just few steps away from Ponte Vecchio, the Pitti Palace and the Boboli Gardens, in a neighbourhood known for its elegant antique shops and old artisan workshops.

The rooms are 74, Classic, Superior, Deluxe, Junior Suite and Suite, all are fitted out with the best, most up-to-date mod-cons and still preserve the charm of the past. The Tuscan Floor is reminiscent of old world Tuscan colours and themes, very warm and inviting. The new restaurant La Chiostrina is located in a historical courtyard of the hotel, it is the ideal place for delicious gastronimic specialities in Florence, its versatility makes it an excellent restaurant offering an innovative menu. name: Safestay Warsaw Old Town
description: Safestay Warsaw Old Town is not only a place to stay, but also a way of life. Safestay Warsaw Old Town is the largest hostel in downtown of Warsaw, opened on April 2016. We occupy 4 floors in a separate 5-story building on Krakowskie Przedmiescie - the best-possible touristic location in the city. you will find a bar in the common room where you can order breakfasts in the morning or have a drink in the evening chatting with other dream guests. Each room has: individual lockers; Modern and cozy hostel will be perfect place for solo travelers and groups of friends. People come here to take a pause in the hectic rhythm of life, feel like a local and get an exciting experience in Warsaw. Our friendly staff will be glad to advise the best bar or what event will gather all the city residents. Equipped hostel kitchen, laundry and common area with pillows will make you feel like home. Please note that due to COVID-19 the kitchen is closed for now. Our conditions combine high-quality of hotel standards and a cozy, friendly hostel’s atmosphere. It occupies 4 floors in a separate 5-story building, which is recognized as an architectural monument to the city. The building has been remodeled and we installed modern systems of ventilation, fire protection, soundproofing and lift, to ensure a comfortable stay for our guests from around the world. All this is complemented by a stylish interior, designed with the comfort and safety of our guests in mind. The Old Town Market Square (Rynek Starego Miasta) is 2 minutes from the hostel, which in the winter, is festively decorated for Christmas, and in summer is full of green trees and beautiful flowers. There are many historical monuments in this street that are worth to checking out: Presidential Palace, Potocki Palace, Warsaw University, Church of St. Anne, Church of St. Joseph, monument of Adam Mytskevych etc. Here you can fully enjoy the beauty of Warsaw and be filled with inspiration! Come to enjoy new, modern interiors, central location, shared and private rooms and a high level of cleanliness. Always waiting for new guests!

name: Hotel Gromada Warszawa Centrum
description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Warsaw, Hotel Gromada Warszawa Centrum is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its quiet environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Hotel Gromada Warszawa Centrum makes it easy to enjoy the best of Warsaw.
The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage, and you can stay connected during your stay as Hotel Gromada Warszawa Centrum offers guests free wifi. Plus, Hotel Gromada Warszawa Centrum offers a hot tub and free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Nowy Swiat (0.2 mi) and Hala Koszyki (0.9 mi), guests of Hotel Gromada Warszawa Centrum can easily experience some of Warsaw's most well known attractions.
When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Benihana, Sushi Zushi, and Soto Sushi - Waryńskiego, which are some sushi restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Palace of Culture and Science (0.4 mi), Old Town (1.0 mi), or Old Town Market Square (1.1 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Hotel Gromada Warszawa Centrum is sure to make your visit to Warsaw one worth remembering.

name: Point A Dublin Parnell Street
description:
Point A Dublin Parnell Street is a comfortable and welcoming base for guests, located within walking distance of Dublin's best shops, bars, and riverfront. Opened in 2022, the hotel has plenty of guest lounge and workspaces, as well as Moore Lane, the first cafe bar in the Point A family. Yes, you can get a pint of Guinness as soon as you arrive. Other features include fast and free WiFi, plenty of power points, and 24/7 hosts to help you feel at home during your stay in Dublin. The daily continental breakfast buffet is extensive, with a healthy and hearty selection to please all tastes.

The bedrooms are fresh, modern, and full of useful essentials: five star beds, mood lighting, TVs with Chromecast, coffee and tea making facilities, and plush towels.

In mid-March 2023 we begin works to add two additional floors with fantastic views to the hotel. The hotel will be open as normal. Breakfast, bar and snacks will all be still readily available. Just be aware that some of the exterior of the hotel will be under wraps and top floor rooms will not be available.

name: The Croke Park
description: The Croke Park, provides our guests with unforgettable experiences. Guests return regularly for our superior hotel product, the service we provide, but most importantly our team. Nestled close to Dublin city centre and Dublin Airport, the hotel enjoys a unique location just steps away from the historic and world-famous Croke Park Stadium. Each of the luxuriously furnished and spacious rooms feature comfortable beds- that are topped with crisp linen and a duck down duvet, free Wi-Fi, 55” Smart TV with Chromecast, while the marbled bathrooms are supplied with The White Company toiletries. Guests will receive a warm welcome on arrival, complimentary car parking, porterage as well as access to the Fitness Centre & Business Centre. Our 'Slice of the City' programme aims to connect our hotel guests with our city and locality, helping them to enjoy "local" and unique experiences by recommending events, a carefully curated '24 Hours in Dublin' guide and our 'Good Shopper Guide'. In addition, for more experiences, the 'Do Dublin' tour bus stops right at the hotel's front door and our Clefs d'Or concierge team are always on hand to assist with advice on the best things to do in Dublin. For anyone in town for a concert, Gaelic Football or Hurling match, it doesn't get any better than a ticket to the game and a room at The Croke Park Hotel. The Hawthorn, a stunning new restaurant with heated outdoor terrace and bar is the perfect place to dine. Here menus are focused on using the finest local and national produce - complemented by a carefully curated wine list. The newly refurbished bar, The Sideline, is a vibrant all-day ‘live and work space’ featuring a long attractive mahogany bar, cosy snug and tranquil terrace. Dublin Airport is 15 minutes drive, while Connelly Station and the City Centre are a quick 15 minute walk. Also, if looking for something unique to explore, the National Botanic Gardens are a 25-minute walk

name: Number 31
description: Style stays here! Mildly eccentric with oodles of personality, this boutique townhouse hotel comprises a luxuriously plush Georgian townhouse and a minimalist modernist mews. Loved by design enthusiasts, here elegance meets eclecticism and makes Number 31 one of the most original and standout places to stay in Dublin. Luxuriously comfortable rooms in varying styles, a great location in Dublin’s most fashionable neighborhood and a famous breakfast make here the ‘go to’ place to stay for the discerning traveller. Number 31’s very own Irish Mammy, Delia’s “world famous” cranberry loaf and signature homemade granola always leave guests wanting more. The famed sunken lounge harks back to the days when the mews was owned by world famous architect Sam Stephenson. If popular myth were to be believed, the gorgeously comfy sofas were graced by many famous names in Dublin’s swinging sixties. Pieces of art and objet’s d’art from the owner’s private collection adorn the walls and an art deco ‘jazz influenced’ theme runs through the beautifully restored Georgian building and it’s fabulously plush rooms. The stunning garden that joins the two buildings is an oasis of calm. Overlooked by a sunny outdoor terrace, standout features include the beloved statue of Gloire Au Merite and a beautiful fire fountain as its centerpiece. Awards include Georgina Campbell’s Guesthouse of the Year in 2017 and Georgina Campbell’s Best Breakfast in Ireland.

name: Staycity Aparthotels, Dublin, City Centre
description: Our brand new 340-room aparthotel will be Staycity’s largest Dublin property. Located on Little Mary Street, in the centre of the city beside the historic fruit markets and within a minute’s walk of top restaurants, bars and attractions, everything the city has to offer is on the doorstep. Delivering the perfect blend of home and hotel, Staycity Aparthotels, Dublin City Centre offers beautifully designed studio and one-bedroom apartments in a historic and convenient location. All apartments include fully equipped kitchenettes, living, dining and work spaces for maximum comfort and convenience — think dreamy mattresses, luxurious rainfall showers, 43” TVs, fresh towels and bed linen, complimentary high-speed WiFi and 24-hour reception. This aparthotel also boasts a Staycafé serving breakfast, snacks and drinks, an on-site laundry service and gym, everything you need to work, relax and explore Dublin. The super convenient location is in the heart of old Dublin surrounded by vintage clothes shops, music stores, ceramics workshops and some of the city’s best restaurants and bars. Top attractions such as The National Leprechaun Museum (350m), Temple Bar (450m), The Jameson Distillery (700m) and Henry Street shopping district (400m) are less than a ten minute walk away. Jervis Luas stop is just a 4 minute walk away which connects to the Dart, Connolly and Heuston Train Stations. Whether guests are visiting the city for work or pleasure, they’re guaranteed the ideal home from home in the city’s most exciting location at Staycity Aparthotels, Dublin, City Centre.

name: Hotel Emblem San Francisco
description: Check in and leave the status quo behind. Hotel Emblem San Francisco in downtown San Francisco where Nob Hill meets Union Square and the Theater District, is a haven for those that think as boldly as they live. Inspiring conversation in all the right ways, with plenty of modern provocations, Hotel Emblem features a cocktail-focused restaurant and 96 vibrant guestrooms. Every corner is designed to spark creativity, from the bar inspired by the Beat Generation, to the book-filled Writer’s Alcove in the lobby, to the eclectic guestrooms, where patterns play and an expressive vibe thrives. This hotel is a muse – and you will be, too. Lend your voice at the weekly poetry slam. Get lost in the flow of nightly live jazz. Tap out a few thoughts on the lobby typewriter.

name: Grant Plaza Hotel
description: Grant Plaza Hotel is a limited service boutique hotel located in the heart of the city. It is recommended by many travellers as one of the best valued hotels in San Francisco. The hotel is conveniently located at the gateway to Chinatown, 3 blocks from Union Square, and within easy walking distance to many fine restaurants and theaters in this exciting city. It is also only 1 block to the famous San Francisco Cable Car line, the Bank of American Building in the Financial District and the 5 stars Ritz Carlton Hotel in Nob Hill. It caters to both business and pleasure travelers, and is the perfect place for a vacation getaway. The Hotel has just a completed renovation in 2015. The comfortable guestrooms are appointed with contemporary furnishings, and have recently been renovated for guest convenience with hairdryer, electronic keycard lock and free (WiFi) high speed internet access. The professional and attentive staff at the hotel will ensure that all guests are well taken care of. If you're seeking comfort and affordability all in one, this is one of the best value hotels in San Francisco.

Experience the cosmopolitan charm of San Francisco at Parc 55. Our location allows access to the city's most vibrant neighborhoods, each with a distinct personality: Union Square, Mid-Market, Fisherman's Wharf, North Beach, Chinatown, Japan Town, SOMA and the Mission. Parc 55 puts you in the heart of San Francisco's best shopping, dining, entertainment and more.

As part of the Hilton family of hotels, we understand the importance of quality and consistency, and value the loyalty of our returning guests. Combining top-of-the-line amenities and facilities with a boutique heart, Parc 55 offers personal connections through thoughtful service and attention to detail.

name: San Remo Hotel
description: We are a family-owned historic boutique pension-style hotel located in North Beach, one of San Francisco's oldest and most popular tourist destinations, and only a few blocks from Fisherman's Wharf. Built in 1906, our hotel maintains an atmosphere of Old-World charm and ambiance with specially selected antique furnishings - no two rooms are alike. The walls of the hotel are filled with a collection of memorabilia and history. Our style is simplicity and sanctuary - there are no room telephones, no televisions, and on the order of European pensions, shared baths which are meticulously cleaned daily, and are private when in use, but for all guests to use. Our rooms are cozy and small, our prices are proportional. Our staff is available while our Front Desk is open to help you find anything your heart desires. A truly unique, non-standardized hotel experience.

name: NH Collection Munchen Bavaria
description: The NH Collection München Bavaria hotel, formerly known as NH München Deutscher Kaiser, is set in the first skyscraper in Munich and continues to be one of the tallest buildings in the downtown area. It is the perfect location for sightseeing, as it is in the heart of the city and a short walk away from Karlsplatz, the town hall in Marienplatz, Augustiner Keller, and the Hofbräuhaus. Guests can enjoy easy links to the airport and across the city, with the train station located only a few steps from the hotel. With 219 rooms, NH Collection München Bavaria is a comfortable and contemporary space in which to relax, and offers free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Connecting rooms are also available and are perfect for families. Every morning, we serve up a delicious fresh breakfast which can be enjoyed on the outside terrace in the summer months. There is a vast spread with options for all tastes complemented by a choice of hot and cold beverages.

name: Hilton Munich Park
description: Located only minutes from the Englischer Garten, the Hilton Munich Park is a peaceful retreat in the city, located 15 minutes from the city center and 30 minutes from Munich airport. Many famous sights like the BMW museum, the Olympiapark and the Allianz Arena are just a short drive away. Every space has been designed to the highest standard, reflecting a fresh and modern, yet elegant look. Choose your own taste sensation in the Tivoli restaurant and take in the majestic views of the Eisbach River. Make use of the hotel's extensive leisure facilities to help you relax and rejuvenate. A fully equipped fitness center with a range of cardiovascular and resistance machines, an indoor pool as well as a sauna and steam room give you the freedom to choose how you would like to unwind. Each guestroom is decorated in a modern style with sliding patio doors, opening on to a private balcony.

name: MOMA1890 Boutique Hotel
description: Das MOMA1890 Boutique Hotel zieht Reisende durch seine einzigartige Mischung aus Annehmlichkeiten und Charme an. Die ideale Lage in München, nahe dem 'Ostbahnhof' und nur 31 Minuten vom Flughafen entfernt, ermöglicht mühelose Stadterkundungen. Unsere 51 individuell gestalteten Zimmer, mit der Wahl zwischen Holzböden und Teppichen sowie Kingsize-Betten, bieten höchsten Komfort. Das Design des Hotels verbindet historische Elemente wie Stahlsäulen mit zeitgenössischem Flair und Originalkunstwerken, um eine harmonische Atmosphäre zu schaffen. Unser engagiertes Personal sorgt für einen herzlichen Empfang und exzellenten Service. Das Viertel Haidhausen, bekannt für seine lebendigen Straßen, unabhängigen Geschäfte und Restaurants, ist fußläufig erreichbar. Die Kombination aus einzigartigem Design, erstklassigem Personal und der lebendigen Umgebung macht das MOMA1890 Boutique Hotel zu einer unvergleichlichen Wahl für Reisende, die eine authentische und komfortable München-Erfahrung.
